title: Araújo
body: There is a branch of the family with this surname that descends from Gonçalo Alves de Araújo, who came to this island in the late 15th century and received sesmaria lands in the place of Jardim do Mar, being known as Gonçalo Alves do Jardim. There is another branch that comes from Afonso Enes de Araújo.

Gonçalo Alves de Araújo: Descends from Gonçalo Alves de Araújo, who came to this island in the late 15th century and received sesmaria lands in the place of Jardim do Mar, being known as Gonçalo Alves do Jardim.
Afonso Enes de Araújo: Comes from Afonso Enes de Araújo

Século XV: Gonçalo Alves de Araújo, who came to this island in the late 15th century
